ygData.subject: Openglad Enhanced
ygData.msgSnippet: About three minutes ago, me and Sean branched off Openglad Enhanced from the straight Openglad port. From now on, the straight Openglad port will only be

About three minutes ago, me and Sean branched off Openglad Enhanced from
the straight Openglad port. From now on, the straight Openglad port will
only be improved with bugfixes. Openglad Enhanced is where we are planning
to make major feature enhancements and other wild stuff like that.

So, we are now starting on our drive to improve Openglad. Right now
we have getting the game to use a modern graphics format and making
classes and such into loadable files as our top priorities. If someone
has an feature they want in, they can either program it in and submit a
patch or put in a feature request on the sourceforge project page
(http://sourceforge.net/projects/snowstorm). There are some other people
working on some other improvements already, but I'll leave it to them to
explain what they're doing if they want to.

As for Openglad the straight port, there are still some minor issues to be
worked out, and as soon as they are worked out in Openglad Enhanced we
will backport them to Openglad normal. This way everyone can play an
enhanced version of the game, and, if they want, try it out the way it was
way back when.

I know this list has some great ideas, so don't hesitate to submit feature
requests and/or write patches.


- Zardus
